title: What is the best royalty music platform? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are referring (and I am trying to paraphrase to attempt to follow your thought) to the specific music genre that seems to be copyrighted easier, thus lending it to royalties, the sky is the limit here. Classical is probably the hardest to see royalties but not impossible.
I personally use this platform to buy/sell my tracks. Very good platform for those who are looking for an additional income. You can also listen to cool soundtracks for free. Hope you enjoy :)
